Howdy! I'm Nathan Winant, a software developer living in Austin, TX, USA, where life is generally good. (Sometimes I even get to help with that...)

By day, I work at Cycorp, where I mainly work on building knowledge-driven applications and developer tools with Java, HTML5, and Javascript. My interests include semantic technologies, web technologies, digital art (particularly with Processing), the application of smoke to food, candlelit dinners and long walks on the beach, and running amok in the woods like a crazy person.
